scripts.build:staging: env-cmd -e staging -r config/.cmdrc.json npm run build
scripts.build:prod: env-cmd -e prod -r config/.cmdrc.json npm run build
scripts.start:dev-server: env-cmd -e devServer -r config/.cmdrc.json npm run start
scripts.start:mock-instrospect-schema: env-cmd -e mockIntrospectSchema -r config/.cmdrc.json npm run start
scripts.start:mock-custom-schema: env-cmd -e mockCustomSchema -r config/.cmdrc.json npm run start
scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync build/ s3://${BUCKET}/ --acl public-read --follow-symlinks --delete --exclude config.json
